subskills.DESCRIPTION: Match common constellations to their basic star patterns using dot-to-dot activities
Create a simple model showing Earth's rotation using a flashlight and globe
Sort pictures of objects as "found in space" or "found on Earth"
Record daily weather patterns and connect them to the sun's position
Demonstrate the moon's phases using cookies or paper plates
Compare the size relationships between sun, Earth, and moon using different-sized balls
Identify and label basic parts of a rocket or spacecraft
Create a simple shadow clock to track time using the sun
Match activities to appropriate times of day based on sun position
Draw and label the main features of a space suit
Sequence pictures showing the daily pattern of sunrise, noon, and sunset
Use simple tools to observe and record moon appearances over one week
